body: Voices from El Salvador's Weblog reports: "Another wave of political violence swept through Cabañas, El Salvador over the Christmas Holiday [...] The tension between the local civil society organizations that led the anti-mining movement and local power structures continues to grow and result in threats and violence."
original_body: Voices from El Salvador's Weblog reports: "Another wave of political violence swept through Cabañas, El Salvador over the Christmas Holiday [...] The tension between the local civil society organizations that led the anti-mining movement and local power structures continues to grow and result in threats and violence."
title: El Salvador: Political Violence in Cabañas

sentence: Voices from El Salvador's Weblog reports: "Another wave of political violence swept through Cabañas, El Salvador over the Christmas Holiday [...] The tension between the local civil society organizations that led the anti-mining movement and local power structures continues to grow and result in threats and violence."
